panels.description:
Power factor is an expression of energy efficiency. It is usually expressed as a percentageâ€”and the lower the percentage, the less efficient power usage is.

Power factor (PF) is the ratio of working power, measured in kilowatts (kW), to apparent power, measured in kilovolt amperes (kVA).
panels.title: PF_AC
